meanings.definition: The quality or state of being loamy.
meanings.sent1: The loaminess of the soil made it perfect for planting crops.
meanings.sent2: The farmer appreciated the loaminess of the earth in his fields.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome joked that he preferred a bit of loaminess in his potting mix.
meanings.sent4: The loaminess of the garden was like a soft blanket covering the earth.
meanings.sent5: The loaminess of the soil felt like a gentle hug to the roots of the plants.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a loamy texture.
meanings.sent1: The loaminess of the ground was evident in its crumbly texture.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners seek out soil with the perfect loaminess for their plants.
meanings.sent3: The children enjoyed playing in the loaminess of the sandbox, feeling the grains slip through their fingers.
meanings.sent4: The loaminess of the soil was like a fluffy pillow for the seeds to rest in.
meanings.sent5: The loaminess of the earth was so inviting, birds often came to bathe in it.

meanings.definition: The presence of loam in soil.
meanings.sent1: The loaminess of the garden was due to the rich soil composition.
meanings.sent2: Farmers value the loaminess of their fields for its fertility.
meanings.sent3: The scientist marveled at the loaminess of the soil sample under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The loaminess of the earth was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The loaminess of the soil was a secret ingredient in the success of the harvest.
